casebody.data:
COOPER
v.
BERGER, et al. 409PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2018

Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Attorney at Law, D. Martin Warf, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Candace S. Friel, Attorney at Law, For Berger, Philip E., et al.

Jim W. Phillips, Jr., Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Eric M. David, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Daniel F.E. Smith, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Grayson Kelley, Chief Deputy, For Cooper, Roy A. (III)

*443The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of September 2018 by Defendants to Strike Portions of Reply Brief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of December 2018."
